email_content:
Dear Sarah,

Thank you for considering my application. As requested, please find the additional information below:

1. Updated Resume
• Software Engineer, Tech Innovations Inc. (2018–2022)
  – Developed and maintained scalable software solutions.
  – Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality features.

Education
• B.S. in Computer Science, Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT)

Key Skills
• Java, Python, C++
• Cloud services: AWS, Azure
• Agile methodologies

2. Professional References
• Jane Smith – Manager, Google – jane.smith@google.com
• Mike Johnson – Senior Developer, Facebook – mike.johnson@fb.com
• Emily Davis – Team Lead, Apple Inc. – emily.davis@apple.com

3. Recent Certifications
• AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner
• Certified Scrum Master (CSM)

Please let me know if you need any additional materials or clarification. I appreciate your time and look forward to the next steps.

Best regards,
John Doe
